name: Rocket Mag
description: Grants 1 additional Rocket charge and reduces its cooldown by 1s.

name: Big Mama
description: Every third Rocket, increases its damage by 75% and its explosion radius by 40%.

name: Rocket Load
description: Hitting an enemy with Shorty reduces Rocket cooldown by 1s.

name: Fan of Rockets
description: Rocket fires 2 additional projectiles but their damage are decreased by 25%.

name: More Rockets!
description: Further increases Rocket additional projectiles by 2 but decreases their damage by 15%.

name: Happy Load
description: Using Rocket has 20% chance to instantly recover its cooldown.

name: Elemental Powder
description: Choose an element. Increases damage of that element for each fury point. Rocket and Shorty deal damage of that element.

name: Pyro/Cryo/Electro Punisher
description: Increases all damage by 20% against burning/cryo/shocked enemies.

name: Vaporize
description: Elemental damage instantly executes enemies with less than 8% health remaining.

name: Warning Rocket
description: Using Rocket increases weapons and Shorty damage by 30% for 6s.

name: Battle Fever
description: While Warning Rocket is active, increases weapons and Shorty auto-critical change by 20%.

name: Wrecking Ball
description: Using Rocket instantly recovers Shorty cooldown.

name: Scanning Burst
description: Shorty marks enemies and ricochets on 2 enemies, deaking 25% damage.

name: Triple Bounce
description: Scanning Burst triggers 1 additional ricochet.

name: Family Pack
description: Increases Scanning Burst ricochet damage to 60%.

name: Shorty Prototype
description: Choose an improved version of Shorty to replace the current one.

name: Headhunter
description: Transforms Shorty into Headhunter. It fires a long range shot which can deal critical damage with a x1.75 critical ratio. Dealing critical damage with Shorty instantly recovers its cooldown.

name: Special Delivery
description: Increases Scanning Burst ricochet damage to 60%.

name: Mighty Blow
description: Increases Shorty auto-critical chance by 10% and its critical damage by 15%.

name: Wild Burster
description: Transforms Shorty into Wild Burster. It fires explosive projectiles and deals 15% increased damage.

name: Suprise Blast
description: Using Shorty has 30% chance to instantly recover its cooldown.

name: House Blend
description: Increases Shorty explosion radius by 50%.

name: Baby Boom
description: Explosions have a 40% chance to trigger a second time with 35% increased radius but 35% decreased damage.

name: Group Discount
description: Increases explosion damage by 30% when hitting multiple enemies.

name: Lucky Powder
description: Increases explosions auto-critical chance by 15%.

name: Point Blank
description: Increases weapons and Shorty damage by 40% against enemies within 7.5m.

name: Nose-Breaker
description: Increases Shorty bonus damage to 80% against enemies within 7.5m.

name: Frontliner
description: While at least one enemy is within 7.5m, increases armor by 12%.

name: Repair'O'Fury
description: Repairs a part of your scratch damage every second for each fury point.

name: Full Throttle
description: While you have no scratch damage, increases firerate and reload speed by 25%.

name: Flawless
description: While you have no scratch damage, increases armor by 12%.

name: Robzerker
description: Taking damage generates 3 fury points and increases your damage by 35% for 6s.

name: Abs of Steel
description: While Robzerker is active, increases armor by 16%.

name: Retaliation
description: Deals 25 damage and apply high impact to enemies dealing damage to you.

name: Self Control
description: Increases maximum fury by 2 points. Generates 2 fury points every 3s. Fury no longer fades over time but taking damage consumes 12 points.

name: Fighting Pulse
description: Increases maximum fury by 2 points. Increases the amount of fury points generated by Self Control by 1.

name: Stubbornness
description: Reduces the amount of fury points consumed when taking damage by 6.

name: Critical Madness
description: Critical damage has 2% chance for each fury point to deal 80% increased damage.

name: Primal Instinct
description: Each fury point increases auto-critical chance by 1%.

name: Nitro Shot
description: Taking down an enemy with critical damage triggers an explosion dealing 35 damage.

name: Top Quality
description: On first 33% ammo, increases weapons damage by 30%.

name: Top 50
description: Increases Top Quality activation threshold to first 50% ammo.

name: Lucky Ammo
description: While Top Quality is active, increases weapons auto-critical chance by 20%.

name: Tempo Shot
description: Every 4 shots increases your next weapon shot damage by 60%.

name: Sharpshooter
description: Tempo Shot shot has 100% auto-critical chance.

name: Power of Three
description: Reduces the number of shots required to trigger Tempo Shot to 3.

name: Mini-Missiles
description: Effects generating fury also generate a charge (max. 10). Shooting consumes a charge to fire one explosive homing projectile dealing 18 damage.

name: Chromatic Firework
description: Choose an element. Mini-Missiles deals damage of that element.

name: Firework Generator
description: Automatically generates a charge every 1s.

name: Hot Potato
description: Increases weapon damage by 25% but reduces your weapon slots by 1. Every 4s, your next reload is instant and throws an explosive grenade dealing 60 damage.

name: Full Price
description: Increases Hot Potato throw damage by 25% and its explosion radius by 25%.

name: Tactical Pocket
description: Reduces Hot Potato cooldown to 2s.

name: Rocket Powder
description: Increases Rocket damage by 20%.

name: Unchained
description: Increases maximum fury by 3 points.

name: Smooth Cannon
description: Reduces Shorty cooldown by 1s and increases its attack speed by 15%.
